action.action-desc: Mr. Bishop of Utah (for himself and Mr. Crowley) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Ways and Means

form.official-title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to increase the deduction for host families of foreign exchange and other students from $50 per month to $400 per month.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Youth Exchange Support Act of 2015 .

section.header: Increase in charitable deduction for amounts paid to maintain certain students as members of taxpayer’s household

subsection.text: Section 170(g)(2)(A) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 (relating to amounts paid to maintain certain students as members of taxpayer’s household) is amended by striking $50 and inserting $400.
Section 170(g) of such Code is amended by adding at the end the following new paragraph:

subparagraph.text: In the case of any taxable year beginning in a calendar year after 2016, the $400 amount contained in paragraph (2)(A) shall be increased by an amount equal to—

clause.text: the cost-of-living adjustment determined under section 1(f)(3) for the calendar year in which the taxable year begins by substituting calendar year 2015 for calendar year 1992 in subparagraph (B) thereof.

subparagraph.text: If any increase determined under subparagraph (A) is not a multiple of $10, such increase shall be rounded to the next highest multiple of $10.

subsection.text: The amendments made by this section shall apply to taxable years beginning after December 31, 2015.
